Constructor Detail

Connection

public Connection(boolean server)
Method Detail

newGame

public void newGame()
Called by the ChatFrame class to start a new game and is bugged. Does not work, causes the program to lock up if executed after a game has ended. Unable to determine. Do not use.

parsePacket

public void parsePacket(byte[] data)
Parses the data of an incoming packet. Packet data are strings that contain a 3 digit identifier, and are then parsed out and the data is passed to where it needs to go, or methods invoked

Parameters:
data - Byte array of a string who's contents is "XXXDATAHERE" where XXX is the 3 digit identifier.

sendPacket

public int sendPacket(java.lang.String data)
Sends a packet to the currently established connection.

Parameters:
data - String that consists of a 3 digit identifier followed by data Ex: "300This is a chat message".
Returns:
returns 1 if successful;

end

public void end()
Used to stop the thread from running. Currently unimplemented.

run

public void run()
Main thread execution. Its main concern is packet handling.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread
